common.siteDescription:
This site is a tool for students at NTNU to plan and document their exchange studies. 

 Here you can see which courses other students have taken during their exchange, and you can create your own plan for your exchange.
common.mobileWarning: This site is not optimized for mobile devices. Please use a computer or tablet for the best experience.
common.disclaimer: The Exchange Portal is not operated by NTNU. The information is based on student reports and may contain errors.
common.newFeature: Support for more study programs is coming soon! Including from UiO (Oslo), UiB (Bergen), UiS (Stavanger), and UiT (Troms√∏).

hints.study: Select the study program you are attending at NTNU
hints.country: Select the country you will go on exchange to
hints.university: Select the university you will attend
hints.studyYear: Select the academic year you will go on exchange
hints.numSemesters: Select the number of semesters you will be on exchange
hints.courseYear: Enter the year you took the course
hints.courseCode: Enter the course code of the course you will take
hints.courseName: Enter the name of the course you will take
hints.replacedCourseCode: Enter the course code of the NTNU course you will replace
hints.replacedCourseName: Enter the name of the NTNU course you will replace
hints.courseType: Select the type of course you will take (mandatory, elective, etc.)
hints.institute: Enter the institute the course belongs to at the university you will attend
hints.ECTSPoints: Enter the number of ECTS points the course provides (convert from the university's units if necessary)
hints.year: Enter the year you started your exchange

courses.info: Here you can explore what the courses from NTNU have been replaced with at the host universities.
courses.search: Search for course code or course name

exchanges.info:
Here you can explore the exchange courses taken by previous students. 

You can see which universities they have attended, which countries they have visited, and which courses they have taken. 
Compare with others in your study and create your own plan.
exchanges.noComments: The student has not added any comments for this course.
exchanges.loginToFavorite: You need to be logged in to add or edit favorites
exchanges.errorSavingFavorites: An error occurred while saving favorites. Please contact us if the problem persists.
exchanges.search: Search for country, university, study program, or specialization

myExchange.info:
Create or edit your overview of the courses you have taken during your exchange. 

Course name and number of ECTS credits are required, where the ECTS credits should be converted from the university's local unit. 

If your study program or specialization is not listed, please contact us.
myExchange.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved data. Remember to update.
myExchange.noChanges: All data is saved and the exchange is updated.

basisInformation.fillExchangeInfo: Fill in information about your exchange

courseInformation.fillSemesterInfo: Fill in the information for the courses
courseInformation.someCoursesMissing: Some courses are missing necessary information
courseInformation.fillCoursesInfo: Fill in the information for your course
courseInformation.enoughCourseDataFilled: Sufficient information about the course is filled in

myExchange.semestersLocation: Is the exchange in the same university both semesters?
myExchange.locationQuestion: What is the university and country for the second semester?
myExchange.loginToEdit: You need to be logged in to add or edit your exchange

operations.confirmCourseDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this course?
operations.confirmLeavePage: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave the page?
operations.confirmExchangeDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this exchange?

errors.notLoggedIn: Profile not available. Please log in
errors.404text: Oops! You are trying to travel to a place that does not exist. Maybe it's time to  to rethink your choices?
errors.contactName: The name must be at least 2 characters.
errors.contactEmail: Must be a valid email address.
errors.contactMessage: The message must be at least 10 characters.
errors.uploadFileRequired: A file must be uploaded to proceed.

contactPage.info:
Do you have any questions or feedback? Is your study missing from the options? 

Send us a message and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
contactPage.name: Name

faqPage.info:
Here you can find answers to frequently asked questions. 

If you do not find the answer to your question, you can contact us through the contact page.

uploadPage.info:
Here you can upload a file with exchange data, for example Learning Agreement. 
The file must be in the correct format for the upload to succeed (PDF or PNG). 

Please contact us for more information.
uploadPage.name: Name
uploadPage.comment: Comment (please include study program, specialization, destination country, university, and study year if not included in the file)

adminPage.deleteUserConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
adminPage.deleteFAQConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this FAQ?
adminPage.deleteExchangeConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this exchange?
adminPage.question: Question
